allowance(address,address).return: The amount of StableToken owner is allowing spender to spend.

params.spender: The address which is being approved to spend StableToken.
params.value: The amount of StableToken approved to the spender.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: The balance of the specified address.

params.value: The amount of StableToken to burn.

creditTo(address,uint256).details: We can assume that the inflation factor is up to date as `debitFrom` will have been called in the same transaction

params.to: The account to credit balance to
params.value: The amount of balance to credit

params.from: The account to debit balance from
params.value: The value of balance to debit

decimals().return: The number of decimal places to which StableToken is divisible.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numererator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getInflationParameters().return: rateNumerator, rateDenominator, factorNumerator, factorDenominator, updatePeriod factorLastUpdated

params._decimals: Tokens are divisible to this many decimal places.
params._name: The name of the stable token (English)
params._symbol: A short symbol identifying the token (e.g. "cUSD")
params.inflationFactorUpdatePeriod: how often the inflation factor is updated.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.to: The account for which to mint tokens.
params.value: The amount of StableToken to mint.

name().return: The name of the stable token.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params._minter: An address with special permissions to modify its balance

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

symbol().return: The symbol of the stable token.

totalSupply().details: Though totalSupply_ is stored in units, this returns value.
totalSupply().return: The total value of StableToken in existence

params.from: The address to transfer StableToken from.
params.to: The address to transfer StableToken to.
params.value: The amount of StableToken to transfer.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.units: The units to convert to value.

unitsToValue(uint256).return: The value corresponding to `units` given the current inflation factor.

valueToUnits(uint256).details: We don't compute the updated inflationFactor here because we assume any function calling this will have updated the inflation factor.

params.value: The value to convert to units.

valueToUnits(uint256).return: The units corresponding to `value` given the current inflation factor.

devdoc.title: An ERC20 compliant token with adjustable supply.

allowance(address,address).notice: Gets the amount of owner's StableToken allowed to be spent by spender.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve a user to transfer StableToken on behalf of another user.

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified address using the presently stored inflation factor.

burn(uint256).notice: Burns StableToken from the balance of 'minter'.

creditTo(address,uint256).notice: Refund balance after making payments for gas in this StableToken currency.

debitFrom(address,uint256).notice: Deduct balance for making payments for gas in this StableToken currency.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new StableToken and gives it to 'to'.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers StableToken from one address to another on behalf of a user.

transferWithComment(address,uint256,stri.notice: Transfer token for a specified address

unitsToValue(uint256).notice: Returns the value of a given number of units given the current inflation factor.

valueToUnits(uint256).notice: Returns the units for a given value given the current inflation factor.
